about_the_game:
This short demo serves as a tutorial for the whimsical adventure awaiting you in the full game. You'll discover how to craft quirky dishes, shrink slugs, and utilize skills by tossing a magical briefcase.

Welcome to the wonderful Sanctuary

Living on this idyllic floating island may seem enchanting, but how often does an asteroid strike your planet? What could it be? Before you embark on your grand adventure, be sure to gather everything you can from the Sanctuary and...

Smash it to smithereens!

Smash apart every object in your path to collect crafting materials, seedlings, resources, or even items to toss at those pesky slugs blocking your way to the magical mirror.

Check out our lightning-fast slot-crafting system

Quickly combine a variety of materials, including emotions, to craft fearsome weapons or tasty treats on the go—no recipes or cooking stations needed. Savor your best meals for buffs, or hurl cooking mishaps at enemies to alter their attributes!

Catch some adorable creatures

Have you ever dreamed of having a living cotton candy as a pet? Now you can! Farm and breed your first sweet creatures in the Briefbase to gather the resources you need to tackle any obstacle on your whimsical adventure!

Setup your first Skillbuildings in the Briefbase dimension

Utilize resources gathered from the outer world to literally build your skills in the Briefbase. The Puff Propeller enables you to reach higher places or escape trouble, while the Briefbase Vortex allows you to avoid running around creatures and instead suck them directly into your magical briefcase.

Challenge Snotty to step through the mirror

Engage in playful combat, where food is your weapon of choice! Battle the king of cosmic slugs, "Snotty," by hurling crafted dishes at him and watch as he reacts in surprising ways. Whether he gets stunned by sweetness or enraged by a spicy meal, every fight is a delightful and unpredictable food fight!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is in pre-production, so audio-visual and control settings are not yet available.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is in pre-production, so audio-visual and control settings are not yet available.
